description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a man in a white garment holds his large hand out in front of him tentatively; his knee is propped up in front of him and is covered in a black cloth
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. E.63-A | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1964
portfolio: From Plate 9 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel.
title: Akaki in a Delirium, Plate 9 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
